title: Software Engineer
jobDescription: Develop and maintain scalable web applications with cross-functional teams.
qualifications: 3+ years of experience in full-stack development
Proficiency in JavaScript, React, and Node.js

title: Content Writer
jobDescription: Create engaging content for blogs, articles, social media, and websites.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Journalism, English, or related field
2+ years of experience in content writing or copywriting

title: Data Analyst
jobDescription: Analyze data trends and generate reports to support business decision-making.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field
Experience with SQL, Python, and data visualization tools
Ability to interpret and present data insights effectively

title: UI/UX Designer
jobDescription: Design user-friendly interfaces and improve user experiences across web and mobile applications.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Design, HCI, or related field
Experience conducting user research and usability testing
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, and Sketch

title: DevOps Engineer
jobDescription: Maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate infrastructure, and improve system reliability.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field
Experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform
Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash, or PowerShell)

title: Customer Support Representative
jobDescription: Assist customers with inquiries, troubleshoot issues, and provide exceptional support.
qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor’s preferred)
Experience with CRM software like Zendesk or Freshdesk
